content: Listen to this message that the LORD has spoken against you, O people of Israel—against the entire family I rescued from Egypt:
Does a lion ever roar in a thicket
Does a young lion growl in its den
Does a bird ever get caught in a trap
When the ram’s horn blows a warning,
Does disaster come to a city
This is what the LORD says:
“Now listen to this, and announce it throughout all Israel,” says the Lord, the LORD God of Heaven’s Armies.
